name: JulietVincentTalk
_source: s;Vincent;We're alive.{w} Honestly, after everything, that was...|Only a little nerve-racking.
s;Juliet;And I've been watching our rear since we fled.|Neither monster nor Trojan have followed us.
s;Simon;Glad to hear it.{w} Even if they do mount a search party, we should be safe now.
s;Vincent;Will we have to fight Lord Morrissey now?
s;Simon;I... don't know. I wouldn't like to.
s;Vincent;We aren't the same rough band of survivors as before.|Lord Morrissey's armies dwarfed us once.
s;Vincent;But not in spirit.{w} We- your men are elite, Simon.|We're loyal.
s;Juliet;What he's trying to say is that if Morrissey wanted to pick a fight,|this wasn't a smart one.
s;Simon;I appreciate your optimism.|It isn't that I think we can't win.|I'm just tired of bloodshed.
s;Simon;Still, it's good to know you two still have my back.
s;Vincent;As if we would ever falter.
